name: LossKind
title: Loss Kind
description: Loss Kind codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Damage to building structures caused by fire.

designation.value: Feu - Bâtiments
Incendio - Edificios

concept.definition: Damage to contents and personal property caused by fire.

designation.value: Feu - Contenus
Incendio - Contenidos

concept.display: Windstorm and Hail - Standard Coverage - Buildings
concept.definition: Damage to building structures from wind or hail under standard coverage terms.

designation.value: Tempête de vent et grêle - Garantie Normale - Bâtiments
Tormenta de viento y granizo - Cobertura estándar - Edificios

concept.display: Windstorm and Hail - Standard Coverage - Contents
concept.definition: Damage to contents from wind or hail under standard coverage terms.

designation.value: Tempête de vent et grêle - Garantie Normale - Contenus
Tormenta de viento y granizo - Cobertura estándar - Contenidos

concept.display: Windstorm and Hail - Special Coverage - T.V. Aerials, etc.
concept.definition: Damage to external antennas and similar equipment from wind or hail under special coverage.

designation.value: Tempête de vent et grêle - Garantie spéciale - Antennes de télévisions, etc.
Tormenta de viento y granizo - Cobertura especial - Antenas de TV, etc.

concept.definition: Water damage to building structures under standard coverage terms.

designation.value: Dégât d'eau - Garantie Normale - Bâtiments
Daño por agua - Cobertura estándar - Edificios

concept.definition: Water damage to contents under standard coverage terms.

designation.value: Dégât d'eau - Garantie Normale - Contenus
Daño por agua - Cobertura estándar - Contenidos

concept.display: Water Damage - Special Coverage - Sewer Backup
concept.definition: Damage caused by water backing up through sewers or drains.

designation.value: Dégâts d'eau – Garantie spéciale – Refoulement d'égout
Daño por agua - Cobertura especial - Respaldo de alcantarillado

concept.display: Water Damage - Special Coverage – Flood/Overland Water
concept.definition: Damage from flooding or surface water flowing over land.

designation.value: Dégâts d'eau – Garantie spéciale – Inondation/eaux de surface
Daño por agua - Cobertura especial - Inundación/agua superficial

concept.definition: Water damage under special coverage not categorized elsewhere.

designation.value: Dégâts d'eau – Couverture spéciale – Divers
Daño por agua - Cobertura especial - Otros

concept.display: Water Damage - Special Coverage - Sewer Backing, Flood, etc.
concept.definition: Combined water damage from sewer backup and flooding under special coverage.

designation.value: Dégat d'eau - Garantie spéciale - Refoulement d'égout, inondation
Daño por agua - Cobertura especial - Respaldo de alcantarillado, inundación, etc.

concept.display: Burglary or Theft - On Premises Loss
concept.definition: Property stolen or taken from the insured premises.

designation.value: Cambriolage ou vol - Sur les lieux
Robo o hurto - Pérdida en las instalaciones

concept.display: Burglary or Theft - Off Premises Loss
concept.definition: Property stolen or taken while away from the insured premises.

designation.value: Cambriolage ou vol - Hors des lieux
Robo o hurto - Pérdida fuera de las instalaciones

concept.definition: Loss where property goes missing without known cause or explanation.

designation.value: Garantie spéciale - Disparition mystérieuse
Cobertura especial - Desaparición misteriosa

concept.display: Personal Liability - for Bodily Injury or Death
concept.definition: Liability for physical injury or death of another person, including employer's liability, voluntary compensation, and medical payments.

designation.value: Responsabilité personnelle - pour blessure physique ou mort
Responsabilidad personal - por lesión corporal o muerte

concept.definition: Liability for damage to another person's property.

designation.value: Responsabilité personnelle - pour dommages sur la propriété
Responsabilidad personal - por daño a la propiedad

concept.definition: Breakage of glass with a deductible amount of fifty dollars or more.

designation.value: Bris de vitre - Déductible de 50$ (ou plus)
Rotura de vidrio - Deducible de $50 (o mayor)

concept.definition: Structural failure resulting in a building falling down or caving in.

designation.value: Effondrement de bâtiment
Colapso de edificio

concept.display: Collision, Upset, or Overturn of Carrying Vehicle
concept.definition: Damage caused when a transport vehicle collides, tips over, or overturns.

designation.value: Collision ou renversement d'un véhicule de transport
Colisión, vuelco o volcadura de vehículo de transporte

concept.definition: Damage resulting from seismic activity or ground movement.

designation.value: Dommages de tremblement de terre
Daño por terremoto

concept.display: Smoke Damage - Faulty Operation of Heating Device
concept.definition: Damage from smoke produced by malfunctioning heating equipment.

designation.value: Dommages de fumée - Mauvais fonctionnement d'un dispositif de chauffage
Daño por humo - Operación defectuosa de dispositivo de calefacción

concept.definition: Intentional damage or destruction of property.

designation.value: Vandalisme ou acte malicieux
Vandalismo o actos maliciosos

concept.definition: Breakage of glass with a deductible amount of twenty-five dollars.

designation.value: Bris de vitre - Déductible de 25$
Rotura de vidrio - Deducible de $25

concept.definition: Breakage of glass with a deductible amount of ten dollars.

designation.value: Bris de vitre - Déductible de 10$
Rotura de vidrio - Deducible de $10

concept.definition: Breakage of glass with no deductible amount applied.

designation.value: Bris de vitre - Pas de déductible
Rotura de vidrio - Sin deducible

concept.definition: Mandatory removal of occupants from a large area due to an emergency or hazard.

designation.value: Évacuation de masse
Evacuación masiva

concept.definition: Sudden and violent release of energy causing damage to property.

designation.value: Explosion
Explosión

concept.definition: Damage caused by electrical discharge from the atmosphere.

designation.value: Foudre
Rayo

concept.definition: Damage from water freezing in pipes or plumbing systems.

designation.value: Gel de plomberie
Congelación de tuberías

concept.display: Weight of Snow, Ice or Sleet
concept.definition: Damage from accumulation of frozen precipitation on structures.

designation.value: Poids de la neige, glace ou grésil
Peso de nieve, hielo o aguanieve

concept.definition: Losses not categorized under any other specific loss kind.

designation.value: Toutes autres pertes
Todas las demás pérdidas
